ModMetaData.name: MechanoidFunctionalityRework
ModMetaData.author: Icewave
ModMetaData.description:
This mod expands the functionality of the Centurion mechanoid by allowing it to act as a proxy commander, similar to a mechanitor. With this mod, players can draft and command mechanoids within the Centurion's command range, enabling more dynamic combat control. Additionally, the Centurion can now fulfill the requirement of having a colonist in a caravan, allowing players to form mechanoid-only caravans.
Key Features: - Command mechanoids within the Centurion's range, just like a mechanitor. - Draft mechanoids for combat directly through the Centurion. - Use the Centurion as a colonist proxy to fulfill caravan requirements, enabling mechanoid-only caravans. - Optimized code to ensure smooth performance with large modlists and mod compatibility.
Dependencies: - Requires the Biotech DLC.
